attributes.action: Ban the relaxation of rules for double jabbed people.
attributes.additional_details:
Treat everybody equal the vaccine does not stop you getting covid-19 or stop you spreading it. They can go on holiday and not isolate once there, even if someone in there household has covid.
They are allowed to go to indoor venues and not do covid tests prior. 
The government are putting peoples lives at risk and should be liable for involuntary man slaughter or endangerment, if someone who has been double jabbed gives someone who hasn’t been vaccinated COVID-19.
attributes.background: I want the government to make rules for vaccinated people the same as unvaccinated. Its proven that they can still get the virus and pass it on. They are allowed to go out and continue as normal even though someone in there house hold has Covid-19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239
